_header: Some time befell so in this land
Note: For the usual text see 56 and 5598.
_description: Thais, a Narratio in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Sum tyme bifell so in þis landA comun woman was dwelland…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And seþin hir gast to god gaf schoGod grante vs grace so forto do
BLHar4196.Editions:
Rosenthal,  Constance Lowegrund. 
             The Vitae Patrum in Old and Middle English Literature.
         Philadelphia, 1936; repr. Folcroft, PA: Folcroft Library,
            1974: 159-60.
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.231-233.
